Citations.Cited_Guidance: A study role must not reference both assigned persons and organizations.

rule.Check:
study.versions@$sv.
  ($sv.roles[assignedPersons and organizationIds])@$r.
    {
      "instanceType": $r.instanceType,
      "id": $r.id,
      "path": $r._path,
      "name": $r.name,
      "code": $r.code.decode,
      "assignedPersons.id: name(jobTitle)": "["&$join($r.assignedPersons.(id&": "&name&"("&jobTitle&")"),"; ")&"]",
      "organizationIds": $r.organizationIds[],
      "Organization.id: name": 
        "["&$join($r.organizationIds.($oid:=$;$oid&": "&($o:=$sv.organizations[id=$oid];$o?$o.name:"Invalid organizationId")),"; ")&"]"
    }
rule.Description: A study role must not reference both assigned persons and organizations.

Outcome.Message: The study role references both at least one assigned person and at least one organization.
